description: dark brown/black ground; three fan shapes--two decorated with landscapes, one with insect on a tree trunk; gold and silver squares, bars, and circles in background; purple silk cord
markings: in red jar 壺印: 重美 {Jūbi}
medium: Lacquer (hiramaki-e, usu-nashiji, nashiji, okibirame), gold, silver; silk cord
signed: in gold: 長谷川巨鱗齋 {Hasegawa Kyorinsai}
title: Three-case inro with fan-shaped panels showing paintings of landscapes or pine
